review: Set up was incredibly simple and the interface runs smoothly, especially compared to the Chrome. My only criticism is that I travel a lot for work and a big reason why I bought the Fire Stick was so that I could use it in hotel rooms during my travels. I've been on multiple trips since the purchase and stayed at a variety of hotels but I have yet to be able to get the Fire Stick to work. Calls to customer support haven't been helpful and I wasn't able to find support online either. If I could get that functionality to work then I would give it all 5 stars.
author: Crystal Thompkins

review: Had a Chromecast until one of the kids accidently damaged it. Decided to try the Fire Stick this time around-I cannot tell you how pleased I was! Still have all the same capabilities - screen mirroring, access to all of favorite apps (Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime) and it is so fast!  LOVE the included remote control-makes browsing so much easier - and it's about 2 to 3 times faster at loading content than the Chromecast. Extremely happy with this purchase!

review: It is easy to use and quick to install. It is disappointing that you still have to pay for so many of the shows and movies, even with a Prime Membership. So you pay for the Firestick, and you pay to be a Prime member, and then you have to pay for the shows too. Not really worth it. Should have gone with a different product.
